whyTutorCard.title: Why Choose a Private Tutor?
whyTutorCard.subtitle: Unlock your child's full potential with personalized tutoring!

cards.title: Customized Learning
cards.description: Every student is unique and deserves a tailored learning experience.

points.text: Customized to student’s learning style, pace, needs, and weaknesses.
Explain and clarify confusing topics.
Keep students on track with regular feedback.

cards.title: Improved Academic Performance
cards.description: Boost your child's grades and confidence.

points.text: Train productive study skills and habits.
Reinforce classroom learning.
Improve performance on tests and exams.
Provided to suit needs.

cards.title: Confidence - Competence Loop
cards.description: Boost confidence through positive results, fostering a deeper interest in learning.

points.text: Builds confidence through encouragement and support.
Higher confidence leads to greater interest and better academic results.
Minimizes anxiety related to schoolwork and exams.

cards.title: Better Learning Environment
cards.description: Provide a safe environment for students to learn.

points.text: Allows students to ask questions and make mistakes without fear.
Benefit from 1-on-1 sessions.
Set and achieve academic goals with a tutor.

cards.title: Flexible Scheduling
cards.description: Convenient sessions that fit your child's schedule.

points.text: Create a schedule that works best for the student, or reschedule as needed.
Options for home, nearby café, or remote sessions.
Increase or decrease the number of sessions as needed.
Strengthen foundational knowledge for future success.
Develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
